name: Orok

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: Orok has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Orok's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

environment: forest, swamp, hill, urban, desert, coastal, arctic, mountain, underdark
